name: radioactivity_concentration_of_249Cm_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Cm" means the element "curium" and "249Cm" is the isotope "curium-249" with a half-life of 4.43e-02 days.
